info.title: U.S. EPA Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) - Code Lookups
info.description: Enforcement and Compliance History Online (ECHO) is a tool developed and maintained by EPA's Office of Enforcement and Compliance Assurance for public use. ECHO provides integrated compliance and enforcement information for about 800,000 regulated facilities nationwide.

contact.name: US EPA, OECA Integration, Targeting and Access Branch

license.name: Creative Commons Zero Public Domain Dedication

output.name: output
output.description:
Output Format Flag.  Enter one of the following keywords:
- JSON = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation (default).
- JSONP = Data model formatted as Javascript Object Notation with Padding.  
- XML = Data model formatted as Extensible Markup Language.

callback.name: callback
callback.description: JSONP Callback.  For use with JSONP and GEOJSONP output only.  Enter a name of the function in which to wrap the JSON response.

search_term.name: search_term
search_term.description: Enter a partial or complete search phrase or word.

search_code.name: search_code
search_code.description: Enter a partial or complete code value.

wbd_level.name: wbd_level
wbd_level.description: The number of digits of the watershed code [Hydrologic Unit Code (HUC)] returned in the ValueCode. Must be an even number between 4 and 12.

descending.name: descending
descending.description: Output Sort Column Descending Flag.  Enter Y to column identified in the newsort parameter descending.  Enter N to use ascending sort order. Used only when newsort parameter is populated.

get.summary: ECHO Air Pollutants Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of air polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO Air Pollutants Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of air polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO BP Tribes Lookup Service
get.description: Returns the EPA Standard Indian Tribes and Native Alaskan Villages tribal_id and tribe_name.

200.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO BP Tribes Lookup Service
post.description: Returns the EPA Standard Indian Tribes and Native Alaskan Villages tribal_id and tribe_name.

200.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO CP Citations Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of ??? based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is always null.

post.summary: ECHO CP Citations Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of ??? based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is always null.

get.summary: ECHO CWA Parameter Lookup Service
get.description: Look up Clean Water Act parameter codes and descriptions in the Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (ICIS-NPDES) by code or term.

200.description:
Returns an array of parameter codes and descriptions that contain the search_term or search_code entered. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the 5-digit parameter code.
ValueDescription is the parameter description.

post.summary: ECHO CWA Parameter Lookup Service
post.description: Look up Clean Water Act parameter codes and descriptions in the Integrated Compliance Information System - National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (ICIS-NPDES) by code or term.

200.description:
Returns an array of parameter codes and descriptions that contain the search_term or search_code entered. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the 5-digit parameter code.
ValueDescription is the parameter description.

200.description: Returns an array of water polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

200.description: Returns an array of water polluntants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO GHG Facility Types Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of Green House Gas Facility Type codes and descriptions  based on the provided search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO GHG Facility Types Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of Green House Gas Facility Type codes and descriptions  based on the provided search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO GHG Subparts Lookup Service

200.description: Results are an array of Green House Gas Subpart codes and descriptions that meet the selection criteria.  If no criteria is provided, all codes and descriptions are returned.

post.summary: ECHO GHG Subparts Lookup Service

200.description: Results are an array of Green House Gas Subpart codes and descriptions that meet the selection criteria.  If no criteria is provided, all codes and descriptions are returned.

get.summary: ECHO ICIS NPDES Inspection Types Lookup Service
get.description: Returns the ICIS NPDES Compliance Monitoring Type Code and Description.

200.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

post.summary: ECHO ICIS NPDES Inspection Types Lookup Service
post.description: Returns the ICIS NPDES Compliance Monitoring Type Code and Description.

200.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

get.summary: ECHO ICIS Law Sections Lookup Service
get.description: Returns the ICIS Law Section Descriptions.

200.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

post.summary: ECHO ICIS Law Sections Lookup Service
post.description: Returns the ICIS Law Section Descriptions.

200.description: Returns an array of icis_inspection_types codes and their description. If search term or search code is  not provided, all values are returned.

get.summary: ECHO NPDES Parameters Lookup Service
get.description: ICIS Limit Parameter Code and Name lookup based on the supply of a partial parameter name. (NPDES = National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

200.description: Returns an array of NPDES Parameter Codes and their description that meet the search term. If the search term is not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO NPDES Parameters Lookup Service
post.description: ICIS Limit Parameter Code and Name lookup based on the supply of a partial parameter name. (NPDES = National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System)

200.description: Returns an array of NPDES Parameter Codes and their description that meet the search term. If the search term is not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO RCRA State Districts Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of local districts for the given state.

post.summary: ECHO RCRA State Districts Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of local districts for the given state.

get.summary: ECHO RPO Regions Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of Regional Planning Organizations based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO RPO Regions Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of Regional Planning Organizations based on search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO SDWA Contaminants Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of SDWA contaminants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO SDWA Contaminants Lookup Service

200.description: Returns an array of SDWA contaminants containing search term or search code. If search term or search code not provided, returns all values.

get.description: Tribe Lookup (SDWIS = Safe Drinking Water Information System)

200.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

post.summary: ECHO SDWIS Tribes Lookup Service
post.description: Tribe Lookup (SDWIS = Safe Drinking Water Information System)

200.description: Returns an array of tribes containing the search term. If search term not provided, returns all values.

get.summary: ECHO WBD Code Lookup Service
get.description: USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name lookup based on a supplied WBD Code and Watershed Level

200.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD code and WBD level provided. If WBD Code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

post.summary: ECHO WBD Code Lookup Service
post.description: USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Name lookup based on a supplied WBD Code and Watershed Level

200.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD code and WBD level provided. If WBD Code not provided, returns all values. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

get.summary: ECHO WBD Name Lookup Service
get.description: USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Code lookup based on a supplied WBD Name and Watershed Level

200.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD name and WBD level provided. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

post.summary: ECHO WBD Name Lookup Service
post.description: USGS Watershed Boundary Dataset (WBD) Code lookup based on a supplied WBD Name and Watershed Level

200.description: Returns an array of WBD names and codes based on the WBD name and WBD level provided. ValueCode is the WBD Code containing the number of digits provided in the WBD level.

ValueLongDesc.title: Lookup Long Description
ValueLongDesc.example: All phosphorus and phosphate pollutant parameters. Section 3.1.3 of the Technical Users Background Document for the DMR Pollutant Loading Tool describes how the Loading Tool identifies phosphorus parameters and aggregates phosphorus loads.

Category.title: Category
Category.description: A code that uniquely identifies a category of Supplemental Environment Project (SEP) for a settlement (e.g., Assessments and Audits, Environmental Compliance Promotion, Emergency Planning and Preparedness, Environmental Restoration).
